description:
It was just over 24 hours ago that Islamic State militants released a video depicting the burning alive of the captured Jordanian pilot Moaz al-Kasasbeh. What's followed has been reaction and counter-reaction. A US official has said that just after Lieutenant Kasasbeh was captured in December, the United Arab Emirates has suspended its involvement in the American-led airstrikes against IS. By contrast, Jordan's King Abdullah has vowed a relentless war against IS. The BBC's Middle East correspondent Jim Muir is in the Jordanian capital Amman.

"This horror video that's been put out by IS, showing the burning of the pilot, which is undoubtedly I think the most gruesome and really kind of gut-wrenching piece of material that's come out of Syria since the war began in 2011. I think it's had, as far as one can see, certainly for the moment, it's had a rallying effect in Jordan where there had been quite a lot of criticism being voiced by quite a number of sectors of society about Jordan's involvement in the coalition war on ISIS or IS."

title: 约旦飞行员遇害（有声）

description:
《英乐天天唱》是一档模仿唱歌类节目，目的在于提升大家的英语口语能力。主持人会在每期节目中选取好听的歌曲片段，并给出发音提示和模仿示例。喜欢听音乐的童鞋可要积极参与哦！去沪江部落订阅本节目！

卡彭特乐队（The Carpenters）是美国歌星理查德·卡彭特和卡伦·卡彭特兄妹二人组成的演唱组合，1970年代和1980年代初期风靡一时。在华语地区他们演唱的《Yesterday Once More》（昨日重现）、《Top of the World》（世界之颠）、《Please Mr. Postman》（请等一下，邮差先生）等歌曲广为人知。

讲解：

When I was young
I'd listen to the radio
Waitin' for my favorite songs When they played I'd sing along
It made me smile.

Those were such happy times
And not so long ago
How I wondered where they'd gone
But they're back again
Just like a long lost friend
All the songs I loved so well.

Every Sha-la-la-la
Every Wo-o-wo-o
Still shines
Every shing-a-ling-a-ling
That they're startin' to sing
So fine.

When they get to the part
Where he's breakin' her heart
It can really make me cry
Just like before
It's yesterday once more.

模唱：

想要得到主持人专业的点评和意见吗？快来节目现场一试身手吧>>
